1.content: Which Star wars lady are you shrunk around?
1.title: Who to choose?

11.content:
Your head was pounding, your pristine white armor was scorched and shredded, and one of the eye socket on your helmet was blown out from the explosive charge you failed to defuse. As you come to, you remember what happened.

It was a rebel commando strike on a secret black site. And it was lead by the rebel princess. Leia Organa. Their target was a biological agent that would make fighting them easier, if not wipe them out. They had cleared through the base, but not without taking casualties. By the time they got to there objective, only Leia and one commando were left. You had killed the commando that planted the charge and had to deal with the princess. It wasn't easy, but you manage to knock her. You had turned you attention to the bomb and started to defuse it, but the charge detonated while doing so. It must have been a low-yield one because you're still alive and have all your limbs.

You sit up and shake away the dizziness and ringing. You look over to where the princess was and he's still laying on the ground. Finally got her. The rebels will be in disarray without her. You said. You got to your feet and head to her. But something was off. The closer you got to her, the bigger she seem to get. It was like her body was growing. When you got to her head, it was massive. What....the hell is going on? You said. Then the princess stirs and moans as she sits upright and rubs her head.

Ah.... That hurt.... She said. She looks to see if her objective was complete, and it was. At least the target was destroyed. Time to...get.... She said as her eyes spot a stormtrooper that only came up halfway to her boot tip. His armor is tattered from being to close to an explosion. Then she remembers. It's the same trooper that K.O'd her. But how did he get like this? The viral agent.... She mutters. The agent must have did this. Now she was more than happy she green lighted this mission. If this was deployed, the rebellion would have been crushed. Literally.

You and the princess just look at each other before she snaps out of it and stands up at full height. You take a few steps back and marvel at the sight of her. More Imperials will be on the way. She said looking away then looking back at you. You.... Don't move. She said. She takes one step forward and it sounded like an orbital bombardment. She bends down and grabs you. She lifts you up to her seemingly flawless face. Then drops you in her breast pocket and quickly leaves.

For a long time, you were alone with your thoughts. This is not how you thought being captured. Let alone ever being captured to begin with. You always thought you'd go out by charging into battle to deal the death blow to the rebellion. Seems like that will never happen now. You just wait and hear multiple voices and sounds of approval. Then movement where you heard beeping. Must be in a med bay. You said. After a minute or two, you are pulled out and come face to face with the princess. She had removed her jacket and just had on the shirt. She gives you a smug smile.

So trooper, quite the situation you're in. She said. You say nothing. What? Lost your tongue? She said. Still, you don't responded. Strong, silent type? Fine. Don't say anything. But since you put me here, you're going to make my stay more comfortable. You don't mind, do you? She said. You bite your tongue to avoid saying something you'd regret. I'll take your silence a yes. Don't worry. It won't be too much for you. Just a simple.....
11.title: Rebel Princess

111.content:
Just a simple foot rub. That should be easy for you right? She said. She place you on the bed and proceeds to take off her boot; letting them fall to the ground. Ah.... Much better. She said. She brings her feet up and drops them in front of you. And really put your back into it. I want to feel those hands on my foot. She said. You groan lowly and start massaging.

Rubbing her foot, you were surprise to how soft it was. Being a princess, she must be on her feet a lot. But you see no rough spots or calluses. Up above, you heard the princess moan in delight. Oh.... That feels good. I can't remember the last time this happened. Keep going. She said. You do just that as Leia throws her arms over her head. You stay on her right foot for for ten minutes then move to her left one.

You know, now that I see what that viral agent does, I regret saying to destroy it. I should have taken it. Then used it against the Empire. She said. You nearly stop at the mention of this. Can you imagine it? The legions of stormtroopers shrunk down to the size you are now? Having a bunch of them rub my feet, be my insole, seat cushion or whatever i think of? She said. Now, Leia wouldn't be that cruel. She'd be no better than a hutt, and that's not a good thing. But she's trying to get a rise out of you, which is working. The thought of your brothers and sisters in arms subjected to this was making you blood boil. You were looking for a way to hurt her, but you had nothing. Even if you clawed or bite her, you doubt she'd feel it. So you just let it go and keep working.

Leia was waiting for a response from you. But nothing happen. No shouting, cursing, or even a punch to her foot. You just carried on rubbing, which made Leia a bit disappointed. Where's the fun in this if you don't fight or talk back? Leia let this continue for 5 more minute then she pulls her feet away.

That was nice. I think you missed your actual calling. You're better at massages than being a trooper. She said. You don't respond to her. Keep laughing, princess. You have to sleep at some point. You mutter. That was the plan. Just wait until the right moment and escape. Until then, you'd have to take any abuse she gives you. Doesn't mean you have to make this enjoyable for her. You're not going to give her any reaction, no matter how horrible it gets.

Still nothing? The Empire must beat the will out of their soldiers. She said, grabbing you. She lifts you up to her face. I'd say let's talk, but it'd be a one sided conversation. So I'll let you rest for now. She said. She acts as if he's doing you a favor. She puts you right on her chest. You look up at her smiling down at you. And don't get any ideas. She said. Not if you were the last woman in the galaxy. You said to yourself.

You lay there on her chest for a few minutes until you heard the sound of snoring. You look up and see she's asleep. She's out like a light. I could try and get away now. You said. Do you go for it?
111.title: Pampering the princess

choices: You formed a plan to safely climb down
Leia eyes opened and saw you just before you could escape
Leia rolled over in her sleep, trapping you beneath her until morning
1111.content: You lay on the princess's chest as it gently rose and fell as she breathed in and out, listening to her slow and steady breathing. Well, you probably weren't going to get a better chance to escape and you didn't want to spend the rest of your life as the princess's foot rubber or whatever else she might have in mind for you. You slowly stood up, standing on Leia's chest was weird as the soft skin gave a bit under your feet, you tried to carefully creep off to the side without waking the giantess you were walking on top of. It was a relief when you were able to step off of Leia's chest and onto her bed itself, although the massive princess was still slumbering next to you. Now you just needed to find a way down from the bed to the floor, once on the floor you could probably scurry around the rebel base unnoticed. At your size any guards probably wouldn't see you, maybe they'd search if Leia told her troops you'd escaped after she woke up but hopefully she'd keep that to herself so she wouldn't have to explain why she'd kept you a secret so far. As you went to peer over the bed...
1111.title: Now's the perfect chance

1112.content:
No. It'd be too obvious. Plus, she might not be actually sleeping. Just seeing if i'd escape right now. You said. You remain there until she opens her eyes.

I'm a little shocked. You didn't try to escape. Maybe stormtroopers are smarter than they look. She said. You ignore her as the door opens. Thinking quickly, Leia grabs you and puts you under her butt. You groan from the pressure and have to wait until she pull you out.

You hear her talking to the doctor for a few minutes before her hand grabs you and pulls you out. She then leaves quickly and make sure no one is around before opening her hand. Sorry about that. But I doubt you didn't like it. She said. You grumble under your breathe. She then head to her own personal room and drops on her bed.

You know, I'd interrogate you for information. But I doubt they tell you troopers anything of value. She said, with a chuckle. You just look the other way. She's being real snarky to you. You can't wait until she's back in cuffs again. If the scientist made this, then they must have a cure for it. You said. At least you hope they did. You don't like the idea of being this size any longer than you have to. Or at least with an enemy of the Empire.

You are brought out of your thoughts when Leia grabs you and sit down. Ok, little man. Let's have a serious conversation. She said. Great.... Now she's going to preach the righteousness of her cause and try to turn me now. You said. I know I've made jokes and remarks about your size and I'm an enemy and all, but let's move past that for now. She said. You look at her and she continues. I know you're not going to like this, but i'm going to say it anyway.
1112.title: Not yet.

11121.content:
Imperial or not. You're still a person in need. So I'll protect you as long as possible. She said. You don't know if you should be thankful or skeptical of her. But you continue to hear her out.

I know you have doubts about this, but I mean it. If you're willing to let bygones be bygones, I'll do what I can for you until a remedy is found for you. If nothing can be done, I'll take care of you. She said, with a smile.

She's given you no reason to trust her. But if she wanted to kill you, she'd done so. Or given you to one of her soldiers and have them do who knows what with you. Your top priority is still getting away from her and back to the Empire. But that is impossible on your own. She'd have to encounter them again soon. That would be your chance to escape. But for now, you'd have to stay and wait until then.

.....Fine. I'm willing to let that happen. You said. So he can speak. She said, laughing. That opportunity better come soon. You mutter. But I'm serious. I'll look after for a long as needed. You have my word. She said. .....Sure. Whatever you say. You said.

Well, with that cleared up. You have a name? I don't think you'd like being called trooper all the time. She said. It's (Your name). You said. That's a cute name. You probably know me anyway, but for the sake of formality, Leia Organa. She said. Leader of the Rebel Alliance. You say lowly. Just one of her many thing she's called.

(Your name), what made you join the Empire? She said. Huh? You said. I'm just curious why you'd sign up with them. Were you conscripted? Threaten? What was your reason? She said. You hesitate for a minute. I'm not going to judge you if that' what you're thinking. Nor will I tell you the error of being with them. I'm just curious. She said. ......Ok. I was patriotic. I saw what the Empire stood for. Peace, prosperity, order. After the fires of the previous war, I didn't want to witness another one. So the second recruitment started, I was one of the first to sign up. You said.

A patriot? Noble. And I thought it was for credits. She said. Some do, but not me. You said, as she gives you a smile. Even though you are a stormtrooper, she would like to have you for the Alliance.

So do you mind putting that patriotic energy to use for me? She said. I already rubbed your feet. What more is there? You said. A princess gets bored sometimes. It's all work and no play. Don't you want to help a princess relax before she goes back to work? She said. *Sigh* Fine. You said. That's the spirit. Now, I want you to.....
11121.title: I'll protect you

111213.content:
" I want you to take your armor off." She said.

"What!?" You replied stunned.

"You heard me. Take off your armor." She repeated with a smile.

"W-why?"

"Because I said so. You can either do it yourself. Or I do it for you. Your choice." She said.

You really don't want to, but you know that making someone who can easily turn you to paste is a bad idea. So you reluctantly take off your armor piece by piece until you were naked.

"See? That wasn't so difficult." She said, grabbing you. You prepare yourself for whatever she has in plan. But nothing happens. Instead, she walks into her private bathroom and turns on the water to the bathtub. She sets you down on the side of the tub.

"What's with that look? You stormtroopers do bathe?" She said, smirking.

"Yeah, but I thought were going to.....do something else." You said.

"What would I.... Oh. Really? That's what you thought?"

"You only told me to take off my armor. What else would that lead to?"

"A bathe, you." She said, chuckling. "You're lucky, but not that lucky."

Leia turns off the water and starts to get undress. She takes off her clothes and you turn your head to the side. When she was naked, she turn to see you looking away from her.

"At least you have manners. Or are you shy about bathing with a woman nearby?" She teased as she tosses them into a pile before getting in.

"N-no. I've done it before. Just...being polite." You said defensively.

"Right....."Leia said before stepping into the bathtub. She lets out a sigh of relief and relaxes herself and turns to you smiling.

"Are you going to just stand there gawking? Or hop in while the water's still warm?" She said. Snapping out of your stunned state, you slide into the warm water.

You tred the water and stay on the side a the water washes over you from time to time

"Ah. If only all my time could be this relaxing." She said. Leia looks over to you and frowns a little.

"What are you doing over there? Come closer. I don't bite"

"I-I'm good over here." You said rather quickly.

"You don't have to be like that." She said, moving her hand to you and pulling you towards her.

She puts and holds you against her smooth stomach, which nearly made your entire face go red as Leia laughs at you.

"If I'm going to be taking care of you, things like this will have to happen. So get use to seeing me naked and vice versa." She said, smiling.

She wasn't wrong. If there was no cure for this, this would be a daily thing. Which wouldn't be too bad for you if she wasn't fighting the Empire. You might as well enjoy this while you can. She said.

You remain against her stomach until she thought it was time to get out. She dries herself and then you off. Except you fought against her, which he found laughable.

When done, she leaves the bathroom and puts you on the bed and starts to put on her white robes on. You wanted to look away, but you had to admit, she had a nice body. So you tried to be discreet while looking at her. Her flowing brown hair, ample breast, slender legs, and round butt. Even her feet looked nice. She was gorgeous. Why did she have to be an enemy?

Unknown to you, Leia knew you were looking at her and laughed to herself. She stuck out her leg and pulled up her pantyhose slowly. Leia looked to see you fully turned to her.

"Enjoying the show?" Leia said, Shocking you.

"N....n....no. I wasn't looking at you. I was....uh....." You said, trying to think of a lie. Leia giggles as she puts on her white boots.

"There we go. Now we just need clothes for you." She said. She kneels down to a lower drawer and pulls out a play doll.

"These should fit you perfectly."

She walks over to you and puts the clothes in front of you.

"You still play with dolls?" You question.

"No. Just a memento of my childhood. Is that a problem?" She said, narrowing her eyes.

"None whatsoever," You said, quickly.

"Good to know"

You put on the brown shirt and pants. Leia giggles as she grabs you.

"Now that that's out of the way. How about we.....
111213.title: Bath with a princess

1112132.content:
"How about we have some fun?" She said, smiling.

"Fun for me or you?" You said a bit nervous.

"For both of us. You act like i'm going to torture you."

"So what do you have in mind?" You said. Leia walks over to the bed and sits down. She then puts you down on the ground in front of her boots.

"Climb me. If you get to the top of my head, you win. I knock you off, I win." She said.

"Just like that?" You questioned.

"Just like that." She said.

"Are you going to catch me if I do get knocked off?"

"Why wouldn't I? I don't want you to get hurt."

Seems all those days of physical exercise are about to pay off. You climb up her boot and made your way to her leg. Leia then starts to shake her foot around, trying to make you fall, but you manage to keep your grip on her until she stops. You make it to her leg, grab the hanging end of her dress and pull yourself up.

"I'm a bit surprised. I expected you to go flying." She said with a laugh. You ignore her and keep climbing until you get up to her knee. You then move across her leg.

"Think fast!" Leia said. You saw her hand moving towards you. You started to run forward and narrowly dive out the way before her hand got you.

"Quick little thing, aren't you? I thought I had you." She said. You take a minute to catch your breathe before you climb up her stomach. You kept moving upward until you saw where you were heading for. Her breast. You know that won't end well for you. So you move to her right side and continue climbing.

Leia was surprised you didn't go through her chest. She had a nice trap all planned out for you, but that's been thrown out now. But she's still got one more chance to win.

After scaling her side, you make it to her shoulder.

"Just a bit more....." You said. You start going up her head. You get halfway to the top when you saw a shadow cast over you. You look back to see Leia's hand coming at you again. You quickly climb up as the hand moved above you and came downward. You move as quick as you could to get out of the way, but her pinky finger hits you and makes you fall into her waiting hand. Her hand moved and brought you to her smiling face.

"Good effort, but not enough." She said. You turn your head as you're actually upset over losing. You were so close to the top.

"Don't be sad. How about I give you a consultation prize?" She said.

"What do you-" You don't get to finish as Leia brought you her lips and held you there, leaving you stunned. She held you there for a minute and pulled you back.

You looked at her in confusion while your face is partly red while Leia giggles at you.

"I take it you never been kissed before." She teased. You just shake your head as you try to find your voice. "Aw! Looks like I took your voice away." She said, laughing a little.

"Now, since I won, I get to choose the second game we play. And I think it will be......
1112132.title: Climbing Leia

11121321.content:
"We're going to play chase the tiny." She said.

"Wait that sounds like it will end badly." You said, worried.

"It won't. Besides, I'm sure a tough little trooper like you can handle anything thrown at him." She said, smiling. You don't know if that was veiled insult or a complement.

"I'll make it easy for you. I'll only use my hands. Fair?" She said.

"Ok.... That will give me a chance at least."

"Good. Then start running." She said, putting you on the ground. You look up at her and get remind just how small you are to her. Although you had to admit, she did look beautiful. Even if she was technically the enemy.

"Are you just going to stand there?" Leia said, snapping you out of it. You turn to run and run fast, but Leia quickly caught you though and lifted you back up to her.

"Are you even trying? Or are you losing on purpose?" Leia said with a laugh.

"Y-you didn't even give me enough time to run." You protested.

"Because you wasted time staring at me. Plus, I'm playing to win. And since I won...."She said, moving you closer to her. Leia pulls open her dress and puts you down into her bra. You are left speechless as she secures you between her breast. Leia laughs as she pushes them together and felt you moving.

"Hope you like it there. I sure do." She said. Leia loved how much power she had over you. She wasn't going to be malicious to you, but she was going to tease and toy with you. She knows you find her attractive as she caught you staring before. She could use her charm and body to her advantage.

You were still left stunned over this. First it was being kissed, now you were put between her breast. If she's willing to do this to you, who knows what else she will do. You remain there for a while until her hand pulls you out and you see you're....
11121321.title: Chase the tiny

12.content: Before or after she left the Jedi?
12.title: Ahsoka Tano

121.content:
The things I do for the Republic..... You said. You had volunteered to test an experimental adrenal that would drastically improve the performance of ordinary clone troopers. You were very hesitant to do this as their was a chance this would kill you, but you think participating in this would look nice on you to help you move up the ranks a bit.

You were injected with the adrenal earlier and sent to the training course. You perform the same way you do in a warzone. Trooper. Do you feel any different? A voice over the intercom said. Not really. My perception seems sharper, but nothing else. You said. Blast.... Back to the drawing board then. Thank you, trooper. I'll let your CO know of your participation. The voice said. Well, this was a bust. Hopefully this gets me to sarge. You said. With this all said and done, you leave the testing room.

You head back to your bunk room when you came across Skywalker's padawan Ashoka. Unlike some of the jedi who treat clones as cannon fodder, she was one of the ones who actually care about the clones she fights with.

Ashoka. Slumming it with the grunts? Started thinking you forgot about us. What would the other jedi say if they saw you with us? You said. Ha ha. But who'd keep you in check from making rash decision, (Your name)? She said, smiling. You and Ashoka had been friends for a long time. It's only because every mission you are sent on sometimes calls for a jedi. And she was it. This friendship between you two make you the butt of jokes with the other clones, but it's all good natured ribbing. If it wasn't for my rash decision, you'd be in a CIS holding cell. You said. I had those droids right where I wanted them. She said. You were on the ground and your lightsaber was gone. You were 2 seconds away from begging for your life. You said. You had one good rash decision and you hold it over me. She said. Well, the only place to go from there is up, right? You're dual wielding sabers now. You said. You have a point. I was on my way to the me hall. Care to join me? She said. Sure. You said.

During that conversation and the walk to the mess hall, you noticed Ahsoka looked taller than usual. You were a few inches taller than her, but now she was head height. You just chalk it up to a growth spurt.

Hey look at that, they are serving good food this time. You said. Well, can't have you guys getting fat. She said, chuckles. And we all can't live on a strict diet of water and berries. We'd be too thin. You said. Real cute picking on a girl's weight. She said. You laugh and she chuckles.

While Ahsoka was getting her tray ready, you again notice how tall she is. This time, she's taller than you. Did Ahsoka just grow? I know she's a togruta, but they don't randomly grow. You thought. You were up to her should now. Then she got bigger and you were to her waist, but that only lasted a few seconds. Now you were up to her boot. What in the name of the Republic is happening?! You said. You look up at the massive torguta as her voice booms out.

You better not say anything about-(Your name)? She said. Where'd he go? You better not be trying to scare me. She said. You were still trying to figure this out. This must be from that adrenal I took. It must have reduced my size because Ahsoka would have known she was getting bigger. Just what did those eggheads make? You said. You need to get her attention. Ashoka! Don't step forward! Look down! You shout.

Your voice must have reached her because she looks down right at you.
121.title: The headstrong Padawan

1211.content:
I...I that? Ahsoka said. She narrows her eyes and they go wide. (Your name) What happened to you?! She said. I tested some new experimental adrenal it- You what!? She shouts,interrupting you and making you cover your ears. Sorry! I didn't mean to shout. She said. She bends down and grab you with both hands and bring you to her massive face. Let me sit down first. She said. Ashoka moves to one of the empty tables and sits down and places you down on the table and the tray to the side. It was like looking at a rancor. Except without all the teeth and easier to look at.

Ok. You said something about a experimental adrenal? She said. The science division were testing a new adrenal that was suppose to enhance the senses. You said. But all it did was make you tiny. She said. Looks that way. Although my perception seems a bit sharper. You said. Why would you volunteer for that? She said. I thought it would help me get promoted. Didn't want to stay corporal for the entire war. You said. And how is that working out now? She said. Farthest from it now. You said. Well, you can't walk around at that size. You'll get crushed. She said. Come on. It's not like I don't pay attention to my surroundings. You said. You're staying with me. And that's final. She said. No talking you out of this? You said. Not even if you could pay me. She said. Alright, fine. Mom. You said as he giggles.

You know, this reminds me of that time when we boarded that CIS dreadnought. I don't remember towering over you. You said. I meant afterwards. When I took that bolt to back and you looked after me. Even carried me to the LAAT. She said. Well, I didn't want to be the one to tell Skywalker his padawan died. You said. Well, now it's my turn. She said. I have a feeling that if this is reversible, you won't let me hear the end of it. You said. You know me so well. She said. Well, better her than anybody else. You said.

Seems like I have enough food her for the both of us. She said. And not a single vegetable. How much meat does one person need? You said. Hey! If you saw the food at the temple, you'd do the same. So i'm going to enjoy myself while I can. She said. Ok. But when you can't pull off those flashy moves anymore.... You said, chuckling. For that, I should let you starve. But I don't want you to faint. You said. With the friendly banter over, Ashoka ate her food while giving you a few pieces.

So you think the scientist can fix this? She said. I don't think it'd be right away. They just made it recently. Well, I'll take you to them so they can start working on a cure. Don't act like you don't like me this way. You said. You are a little bit more cuter, but I don't want to worry about doing anything accidentally to you. She said. You're not a klutz. If that was the case, you wouldn't have those sabers. You said. Was that a compliment or an insult? She said. Whichever make you feel good. You said. Nice way to dodge my question. She said.

When you two were done, she picks you up and takes you to the med bay where one of the scientist were looking at some formulas.

No. That would fry the adrenaline glands. This it- Ahsoka? The scientist said. Hey, Jules. I need your help. Ahsoka said. Not everyday I help out a jedi. What is it? She said. Ahsoka opens her hand; showing you to her. I...is that?! She said, bending down to you. You look into Jules' brown eyes. She moves her brunette hair out the way to make sure. Uh.... Hi. You said. W.... What happen to him? How'd he get like this? She said. That new adrenal did this to him. Ahsoka said. It....shrunk him? Jules said. Yeah. Although not right away. You said. Can you fix him? She said. I'd have to run tests on him. She said. Tests? Ahsoka said. Yes. I need to make sure everything with him is running ok first. Jules said.

Will he get hurt? Ahsoka said. I can't guarantee he won't. Jules said. I'll be fine. If I can handle clankers, some test will be fine. You said. Ok, but I want to stay here with him. She said. Fair enough. Ok. First test is....
1211.title: A friend in need

12111.content:
We'll test how durable you are first. Jules said. I don't like where this is going. Ahsoka said. You won't. But first... Jules said, bring up a syringe. I'll try to do this gently. She said. Just be quick. You said. Jules sticks you in the arm and draws out enough blood for her to look at.

Ok. With that done, we can move on. Jules said. Hold on. Can you explain what this test will be? Ahsoka said. I need to see if there is any changes in his body So I need to see how much pressure he can withstand. Jules said. But that would require him.... Ahsoka said. I know it makes you uncomfortable. That he's your friend and all, but if you want me to reverse this, I need to know what's changed exactly. Jules said. Ahsoka. It's fine. If it helps her reverse this, i'll do it. You said. .....Ok. Just let me do it. She said. Fair enough. Jules said Ready, trooper? Jules said, putting you on the table. Ready. You said.

Ahsoka. Jules said. R-right. Ahsoka said with hesitation. She brings her hand down on you with your head between her ring and middle finger. She push down with a little force a to not hurt you. Hm. Subject's body does well under moderate pressure. Trooper. Any pain? Jules said. Not pain. Just discomfort. You said. Ok. Now let's increase the threshold. She said. M...more? Ahsoka said. I'll be fine. You said to her. With hesitation, she pushes down harder.

Now, how do you feel? Jules said. Like i'm about to burst. You said. Immediately, Ahsoka lifted her hand off you. I think that's enough. She said. Yes. I have what I need. Now for agility. Jules said. Agility? Ahsoka said. It's to see if his movements are impaired in any way. Jules said. But wouldn't I have to.....you know. Ahsoka said. I'm not telling you to crush him. Just stop him. Jules said. I.... I don't know. Ahsoka said. It's fine. Just trust her. You said. This is the last thing. I promise. Jules said. ....Ok. I'll do it. Ahsoka said. Jules grabs you and puts you on the floor.

"Come on. You need to eat. You'd be shouting your head off if I was depriving you of food." She reasoned. You look at her then the food. You sigh in defeat and take it.

"You don't have to make this difficult. We can both enjoy this." She said.

"I'd enjoy if you let me leave." You chastised.

"And have a guilty conscious over what happens to you? Not a chance." She said. You roll your eyes as she gives you another piece.

"Why would you want to leave anyway? You got food, water, and someone who wants you. What more do you need?"

"My size back. For you to let me go. Just to name a couple." You said.

"But the size is all part of your what makes you cute. And I already told you why I can't let you go." She said. You were about to retort when her holocom went off. She stood up, turn around and answered it.

You don't pay attention to it until you remembered your own holocom. You face palm as you could have asked for a rescue this entire time. You reach for yours when Jyn turned back to you with an annoyed look.

"Something came up?" You said, eating your last piece.

"All the information you gave me, my people have decided to act on it. I've been given a new assignment. I leave for it tomorrow." She said.

"What kind of assignment is it?" You said, trying to pry.

"Nice try, but that's for me to know." She said rubbing you with her finger. "Nothing for you to worry about."

"Right....." You said. You couldn't call for help just yet. You had to wait until her back is turned.

"Full?" She asked.

"Yeah. I can't eat anymore." You said.

"Good. Now to give you a proper bath." She said.

"What?!" You said as she grabbed you. She walks over to the bathroom and it only had a sink and toilet. She puts a stopper in the sink and let the water fill up with water. She stops the water when the sink was partly filled.

"It's not an actually bathe, but hopefully this makes up for the whole butt incident." She said.

".....It's a start." You said.

"I'll be back in a few minutes." She said before leaving. When she was going, you pulled out your holocomm.

"Come on.... Pick up, Sera." You said. After a few seconds of trying, Sera, your CO, finally picks up.

"Finally!" You said.

"(Your name)! Where have you been?! A full day without a report is unlike you. I thought you went AWOL or worst." She nearly yelled.

"Calm your little head down and listen. I need you to send a rescue party. A big one." You said.

"This isn't like you to request back up. What's going on? She asked a bit worried.

"Just do it, Sera. I don't know where I am exactly, so i'll send you sector coordinates. Search every building and hurry. Because tomorrow, I won't be here." You said, closing the communicator and sigh. "Let them find me." You said. You slip off your clothes and get into the still warm water.

You try your best to relax.

"They'll find me. They just have too." You said. You clean yourself off twice to be sure you don't smell any more. After a while, Jyn walks back in.

"All done?" She said.

"Yeah. Just finishing up." You said. Jyn helps you out and dries you off with a hand towel before she lets you dress yourself.

When full clothed, she carries you out.

"So while you were in there, I thought of a few things we could as a couple now." She said.

"Like?" You asked.

"We could.....
1321131.title: Jyn's hospitality

13211313.content:
"We could get right to the real fun stuff." She said, smiling.

"Real fun? What do you.... Oh! No!" You said.

"Oh come on. Don't act like you don't want to. It's what couples do."

"Couples. We are not a couple."

"You say that now. But when I'm done with you, you'll be saying a different tune." She said. She walks over to her bed and sets you down. "You're such a lucky person. I wouldn't do this for just anyone."

Jyn grabbed her vest and tossed it away. Then came her shirt, which she slowly took off, leaving her black bra showing. She gives them a quick squeeze. Your face turned red a bit and you looked away, but she tilted your head back to her using her finger.

"No looking away." She said, smiling. She unbuttons her pants and slides them off while her huge butt is facing you. She kicks them away along with her boots and stands in front of you in her bra and panties. You don't want to stare, but can't help but too and Jyn knew it.

"Like what you see so far?" She said, shaking her hips a bit. You don't, really don't, want to admit it, but she does have a nice body. If she wasn't a troublemaker, you might try your luck. Why do the pretty and cute ones have to be the bad?

"Now it's you're turn." She said. You hesitated to do so. Not out of embarrassment, but stubbornest. You weren't going to give her that satisfaction. But she found it amusing. She picked you up and giggled.

"Ow!" She said, recoiling her hand. She looks for any blood, but there's none. She looks back at you....and smiles. "Someone likes it rough. Me too." She brought her hand back and stripped you down naked, despite all of your struggles. She looks you over like she's admiring an object.

"Not bad. Must stay in shape and take care of yourself. Almost see those little abs." She said. You face turns red again. She sits you back down on the bed and undo her bra and took off her panties.

And there she stood. In all her naked glory. Her ample breast and pussy were all for you to see. She was slightly toned like you. You couldn't look away, and despite your best effort not to, you had a raging erection over her body..

"Well... Looks like someone's just as excited as me." She said, laughing as she grabbed you.

"Hope you're ready.... Because I am." She said. Jyn moved her hand down to her pussy and shoves you in.

"Ahh....!"

Jyn moved onto her bed and laid down as she felt you crawl through her. You didn't have much choice to get out. So you had to go through with this.

Jyn's moans got more rasp the further you went. "Yes.... Keep going." She said. You do just that and found her sweet spot. You massage it an agitate it and a loud moan escape from her mouth. Her breathing got quicker and quicker until she came.

She took a minute to catch her breathe before looking between her legs for you.

You were coughing hard from nearly being drowned in her juice. When you got to your feet, you were picked up and brought to her face.

"Seems....like size...really doesn't matter. You did a good job." She said. She brought you in for a kiss and gave you a light lick."My turn to please you, and I'll do it with.....
13211313.title: Get right to the real fun

14.content: Before beginning, where is Rey at?
14.title: Rey

141.content:
You wake up to a searing headache. Ugh.... I knew I shouldn't have had that last drink at the cantina. You said. You get up slowly and balance your self. You let your eyes adjust for a moment and take in your surroundings.

You look around and notice you're in some gutted vehicle that someone made a home out of. And you're own some makeshift bed with a pillow and cover. Wait.... This isn't my home. You're home was no better. Just some partially run down with enough comfort to get you to the next day. But this place was picked apart to live in. Tools scattered about, you see a staff propped up against the counter, and a make shift refrigerator. And the kicker, everything is huge. That's it. No more Bartender special for me. You said. You take this as a surreal dream and just wait it out until you wake up.

That's when you heard chattering of objects. What was that?! You snapped. The source of the commotion gets closer and what you saw almost made you pale. You saw a girl in desert clothing walk in. She was massive. T-t-thi has to be a dream. It just has to be.... Giants aren't real. You said. You pinch yourself, but nothing happens. You do it a few more times, but nothing happens. I....it's not a dream. I'm awake and there's a giant girl in front of me. You said.

The giant girl was looking around like she was looking for something. Then she huffs in annoyance and moves towards your position. You just stare up at her and crane your neck as she gets closer and closer. Then she bends down to collect the cover and that was when you two made eye contact. The girl was surprised and shocked as you are. There is silence between the both of you as you both taken in what you were seeing.

Then she reaches for you.
141.title: The desert scavenger

1411.content:
You couldn't even feel your legs as you look at the girl's massive hand coming for you. You were still trying to understand everything that was happening to you. You were only snap out if it when her hand wrapped around you and lifts you up. With you in hand, the girl rises back to full height.

The girl looks at you for a few seconds as if to confirm what she's seeing as well. She blinks a few times to make sure she wasn't seeing things. She even squeezed you a little; making you yelp in pain. Now there was no doubt about it. In her hands was a tiny person. You wanted to say something, but you were still in fear. If you weren't so high up, you jumped out of her hand. You can only wonder what was going through this girls head as she eyes you up and down.

Finally she speaks to you....
1411.title: You're too scared to move

14112.content:
I have already dealt with a person of the same size... But it was alien, and not very beautiful, whereas you, you have something special! The scavenger says while smiling at you.

Unfortunately I don't really have time to take care of a little bug like you! But for this end of the day you will have the pleasure to have fun with me. The scavenger says looking at you seriously.

You try to struggle, with no results. You are stuck, and because of your small voice, Rey hears nothing.

I would be tempted to humiliate you, but I have another idea, hmmm let's see? Rey says.
14112.title: You're right to be scared. (Mean)

1412.content:
Looking up at the girl's giant hand coming for you was too much for you to handle. Filled with terror, you run away from her. Wha-Hey! She said, chasing after you.

You ran as fast a you could go. You didn't bother to look back as you know one step from her could cover more distance than you could. You just wanted to escape. You could feel the ground shake a she got closer to you. You dared to look back only to see her hand coming right for you. Desperate, you jump forward and narrowly avoid her grasp. You tumble back onto your feet and keep running. She tries a few more times before stopping as it's not working. She then gets an idea. She knows she can outpace you. All she had to do was get in front of you.

You chalk it up to pure adrenaline a how you've stayed alive. But you can't keep dodging forever. You'll tire out. So you came up with a plan. If you could just get out into the desert, you'd be free. No way she'd go that far just for you. You jut have to keep moving and avoiding her. You kept running until her boot landed right beside you. You nearly fall over until her other boot lands next to you. Was she trying to stomp you now? She got close twice, would she do it a third? No. She wasn't trying to stomp you. She was trying to block you as her boot lands in front of you. You didn't have enough time to stop before hitting it face first and falling back.

Your ears were ringing and you head hurting from the impact. By the time you came too, you felt an upward movement. You looked and see you where in her grip and she was lifting you up. You started to panic and thrash around to free yourself. Then, without thinking, you open your mouth and bit her as hard as you could. Ow! She shouts, making her drop you. You land hard on the ground. Luckily, the sand was compiled enough to cushion your fall. You didn't waste time and quickly ran.

That little.....! He actually bit me! The girl said. She looked at her finger and saw a bit of blood. Now she was more than determined to get you. She spots you nearing the exit. No you don't! She said, resuming her chase after you.

You were almost home free when you felt the ground shake again. Oh, blast it all! You said. You don't look back as that would slow you down. You jut keep running forward.
1412.title: You run away

choices: She lifts her foot over you
14121.content:
You were nearing the exit. Just a bit more and you're free from this woman. But you could feel her coming closer, and you had plan for her. You pull out a rusty, but sharp piece of metal and waited behind the sand covered leg of the AT-AT. You made sure she saw you hide.

When she approached, she saw and reached for you, but you jam the metal into her hand as hard as you can.

"AHH!" She shouted.

She recoiled and you took the chance to run like hell. You didn't stop until you were as far as possible. You look back at the distant AT-AT as you catch your breathe.

"*Pant* *Pant* Finally.... Now i'm just in the middle of a desert." You said. You look out in the distance to see the town.

"Long walk. At this size, could take more than a day. Good thing I know a few people there." You said. You take a moment and start your long trek.

With the sun bearing on you, you look on a dune hill to the town.

"Looks like I'm getting closer. Hopefully, I get close enough before night gets here." You said.

You slide down the hill and continue on when you heard a screech.

"W-what the hell was that!?" You said, a bit scared

You turn around just in time to see a creature a few feet from you.

"Oh shit...." You said.

It was spircion. Eight legs and body of a spider, but pincers and stinger of a scorpion. Its poison is not that venomous to people. Only causing numbness. It was only dangerous to insects as the venom spreads quicker in their smaller bodies. You don't want to find out if it will be deadly to you at this size. So you run away as it charges you.

You run fast, but the spircion gains on you quickly and jumps on you. You quickly kick it in the face and toss sand in its eyes. The spircion hiss and as it backs up off you. You get up to run when it uses its pincers to grab your leg. It drags you back towards it and holds you down with both pincers. You struggle in its grip and kick it furiously to make it let go. But this only riles it up.

"Rgh....! Let go of me....!" You said. You continue to kick against it until a shadow was cast over you. You look to see what it was and it was the girl you stabbed in the hand. She was looking down at you and the spircion. You saw the palm of her hand was wrapped in gauze, and the look she had was anything but friendly. You don't know if the situation went from bad to worst.

But to your surprise and shock, the girl doesn't move an inch. Instead, she just crosses her arms and stands there; watching this creature trying to bite you.

You don't know if you should shocked by this or not as you did bite her finger and stab her in the hand. But still, you need to get away from this thing and possible her. You kick the the spircion hard enough that it lets go of you. You get up and it comes at you screeching at you. It tries to knock you over with its huge pincers, but you keep dodging it. You took a glance over at the girl and she still was just watching. You don't know what is worst: fighting this spircion? Or having to deal with her afterwards.

After multiple tries, the spircion changes tactics and do what you did. It uses its pincers to shovel sand at you. You guard your face when you see it lunge and pins you down again. That what made this creature dangerous. If it came across difficult prey, it would change its tactics to capture its prey.

When it had you this time, It quickly jams its stinger into your chest.

"Rgh.....!" You said through gritted teeth. The venom quickly courses through your body and you feel the numbness set in. You soon couldn't feel your arms, legs, or any part of your body. Even with a direct stab in your chest, the venom didn't kill you. Still, you were about to be eaten by it.

Until it was pulled off you. The girl had finally took action and flung the spircion far away. You were thankful for that creature being gone. Until you remembered the girl.

She towered directly over you and she still was still shooting you an angry look. And you can't get away from her as the numbness was still present. You were left at her mercy.
14121.title: Dangerous freedom

choices: Grabs you (She's still mad at you)
141213.content:
If looks could kill, you'd be dead by now. The look she was giving you screamed of anger. Nothing is stopping her from killing you right now. Crush you under her boot, squeeze you in her hand, even bury you under a mound of sand. You wouldn't be able to stop her.

But again, she surprise you by turning and walks away.

"S-she left me." You said. You don't know if that's a good thing or not. Maybe it's good. You don't have to worry about the spircion anymore or her. Now, you just have to wait until the numbness wears off. Under the sweltering sun.

"Great....." You said, dejected.

A few hours later.

You were sweating like crazy. You body felt hot all around. The numbness was nearly gone, but you didn't have the energy from the sun bearing on you. Was this her plan all along? To leave you in the hot sun and have you die from exposure? No. You couldn't die like this. Not in the middle of a dessert.

You bring yourself to your feet and take one step and nearly fell down. You push yourself to stand when you heard a familiar screeching noise

"Damnit....." You said. You look to see another spircion. "Just one thing after another. I think the universe wants me dead."

The spircion comes charging towards you. You still couldn't move well with the numbness still present. This is how it ens? Becoming insect food? Not how you saw dying. The spircion was getting closer and you resign yourself to it.

You were ready for it all to be over, but fate intervenes as you saw a boot land right right on the spircion. The impact sends you back a few feet. You look up to see it was the girl again. She was twisting her foot back and forth then stomps on the creature again for good measure.

"S....she came back?" You said. She watches you fight a spircion, saves you from it, leaves you to bake in the desert, and come back to save you again? What is with her?

When she was done grinding out the spircion, she turns towards you. She walks over to you and looks you for a few seconds before grabbing you roughly. You'd thank her but she shuts you up with her tight grip.

"Don't you say a single word. After all you did, I shouldn't even help you." She said as she tightens her grip. "I should just crush you right now for what you've done to me." Her grip on you tightens even more and you winch in what pain you could feel. Then her hold loosens. "But I won't. You're lucky I feel sorry for you." She said. She carries you all the way back to her home.

When there, she drops you on the counter and walks away for a minute. You don't know if you are blessed or cursed that you are alive right now. Either one, you are just glad to be alive still.

The girl comes back with a small piece of wet gauze and drapes it on you. "That should cool your body down." She said, taking a seat. She sat by you the whole time just looking at you. Would she forgive you? Was she still mad? There was little you could do if she was still mad. Maybe if you apologize first, it will help.

Eventually, your numbness subsides and you stand up. You move your limbs around and turn to the girl.

"Listen. I'm sorry for biting and stabbing your hand. I was terrified and still processing things. I didn't mean to cause you any harm." You said. For a few seconds, she says nothing. The her hand comes to you and.....
141213.title: She leaves you there

choices: You can stay, but you have to earn your keep
14122.content:
You were almost home free. You were near the exit. You look back to see her hand coming for you and you muster up one more jump. Only that's what she wanted. She had brought her other hand down in front of you so you'd jump right into it. She quickly closed her hand.

You thrash around to free yourself, but stop when she squeezed you. Damn it.... You said.

You were thinking all kind of things a the girl carried you back. What was she going to do? Did she do this? Was she going to slowly kill you for biting her? You were on the edge until her hand opens up and she drop you on a counter. You look up at the girl and she's cleaning out the bite mark you gave her. When done, she turns back to you. You try to not be intimidate, but it's really difficult to do that with the intense stare she's giving.

Take a breathe. I'm not going to hurt you. Even though you bit me. She said. H....how do I know that for sure? You said. Would we be talking right now? She said. She makes a good point. She wouldn't be talking to you if that was the case.

And they say no good deed goes unpunished. She mutter. Did.... Did you have something to do with this? You said. Partly. Not you only coming up to half my pinky, but you being here in my home. Wait. You brought me here? You said. Let's just say, I didn't feel right letting you leave drunk. She said. Drunks come out of that cantina every day. What made me different? You said. You paid for everyone's drinks. Plus, you had the bartender's special. Which nobody had tried yet. So who knows what would have happen to you? She said. So you brought me to your home to sleep it off? Wait a second. Did.... Did you..... You said. No! What kind of girl do you think I am?! She said. I mean, it's not like it hasn't happen before. No better opportunity. And it's not like i'd be able to fight back or anyone would hear me scream all the way out here anyway. You said. I can think of 10 better things to do than take advantage of drunks. She said. At least she's honest.... Doubt anyone else would go as far as she has. You mutter.

Guess you have this girl to thank. Even though you two got off on the wrong foot. Thanks for looking out for me. You said. Don't mention it. She said. So what happens now? I doubt you wanted me to stay more than a night. You said. The girl ponders for minute before say.....
14122.title: A huge misunderstanding

141221.content:
Well, you won't last a minute in the desert alone. And it would be nice to have some company. She said, muttering that last part. You're letting me stay with you? You said. Why not? She said. ......What's the catch? Entertainment, massages, personal needs? What are you getting out of this? You said. Nothing except your company. She said. Now you're confused. People always want something on this planet.

Wait a second. So you're going to let me stay with you? No string attached? Free of charge? You said. Is that hard to believe? She said. You laugh a little. You don't belong here. You said. You're already small. No need to make it any worst on you. She said. You really don't belong here. You're way to nice. Alright. I'll take you up on your offer miss....? You said. Rey. You? She said. (Your name) You said. She extend her index finger and you grab it, making her laugh a little.

If we're going to be roommate, we should know a little about the other. You said. Seems fair. Just nothing too personal. She said. I get it. A girl needs her secrets. So you live alone here? You said. Just me and the AT-AT for as long as I can remember. She said. You do want to get out of here one day? You said. Shuttle rides aren't cheap. And I only get so much from scavenging. Plus, I'm waiting for someone. She said. Is this someone important? You said. Very. Let's leave it at that. She said. As you say. You said. From the pensive look she has, it's a touchy subject so you quickly change it.

Are you generally this nice to people? You said. When they deserve it. You seemed nice when I saw you. So why not return the favor? She said. Heh. If I didn't know any better, I'd think you wanted me to owe you a favor. You said. I'm not that petty. She said. Hm. Ok. I think I have a good feel of you. Your turn.

Where did you get the credits to pay for everyone's drinks? She said. I got lucky in a search. Looking for anything of value in the star destroyer. Why? You need some? You said. No. Usually people get a ride out of here. Not a trip to the cantina. She said. I know a few people here. I don't want to leave without them. And I wanted to celebrate a little. You said. And you're shocked at me. She said. Guess we're both few and far between. You said. I guess we are. What about you? You have anyone waiting for you? She said. Nah. Both of my parents are gone, and I never had the time to get a girlfriend. If that's what you mean. You said. Rey wanted you to elaborate, but she doesn't want you to relive it. Although, she's a bit happy that there is someone else out there like her.

We'll pick this up later. I've got to get back to work. She said. Scavenging. You're just going to leave me here? You said. It gets dangerous sometimes and I don't want you in harm's way. Plus, can you take out engines or laser system without killing yourself? She said. Yeah. I've taken apart starfighters a few times. You make sure there's no power in the fighter. If there is, you cut the yellow wire for the engine and the red and black for the lasers. You said. And what fighter is that for? She said. X-wings. You said. A smart guy as well. Another rare thing here. Still it's dangerous at your size. She said, grabbing her staff. I'll try and be back before sunset. She said before leaving.

She cares at least. Still, that leaves me here alone. You said. You could have a look around. But that might be an invasion of privacy to her.
141221.title: You can stay with me

1412211.content:
Well, knowing the place you're staying isn't a bad idea. Plus, you could learn a bit more about your host. You climb down onto the ground and walk around.

You come to what looks like a makeshift bathroom.

"Got to stay clean, but where does all the water come from?" You said. You move on to see a potted dying flower. "You've seen better days."

You walk around some more and it's nothing out of the ordinary for a scavenger, but you came across something that shocked you. It was a wall of tally marks. A lot of tally marks.

"What the...." You said looking at them. You try to count them, but there are too many to count and some you can't see.

"All these marks.... What could they represent?" You said, sounding a bit scared. Your mind jumps to the conclusion that they are kill tallies. But they can't be that, right? If that was the case, you'd be dead by now. She did come off strong and a little rough. But it's Jakku. You have to be rough here or people will walk over you. But that doesn't make her a killer....right?

You step away from the wall and climb back up the counter.

You sit there until the sun was starting to go down, unable to shake the knowledge of those tally marks. You kept questioning what they were for until Rey came back looking a bit exhausted. She came over to where you were at and sat down. You were going to say something, but her eyes landed on you and you closed your mouth. So for the next few minutes, it was quiet until Rey spoke.

"Hungry?"

"Huh?!" You said surprised. "Y-yeah. I am a little hungry."

Rey notices you acting a little strange.

"Are you alright? You seem a bit....off. Did someone come by?" She said.

"N...no. I'm fine. Really." You said, giving a fake smile.

"Ok.... I'm going to find some food for us." She said. She gets up and you breathe out in relief. You wait for her and she comes back with a sandwich. From the meat, you tell it's boar meat brought from another planet. She tears off a piece and hand it to you. Rey stifled a giggle as he watched you eat. She won't admit it, but it was cute watching you eat. You both eat until you are full.

"Thanks." You said.

"Don't mention it." She said. Rey stands up. "I'll be back in a second. Stay here."

"Sure." You said. Rey walks off, and when she's out of sight. You jump off the counter onto the soft sand. You quickly followed her and see her at the wall of tally marks. She looks at the wall for a few seconds before adding another mark to it. You nearly gasp. When she turns around to leave, you hug the wall to hide as her foot lands near you; covering you in a bit of sand. When she gets back, she sees you're gone.

"W-where did you go?" She said. She looks around for you but comes up empty. "I said stay here."

"She added another mark to it. Is she really a killer? If she was, I'd be dead. Unless she keeping me until she gets bored. No. She wouldn't be that cruel." You said. You were trying to rationalize this as best you can, but it was not making any sense. You would ask, but are too scared of the answer. You look out to see Rey searching for you and sighs.

"Ok. Want to play hide and see? Alright. But I'll have a little fun of my own when I find you." She said, with a small smile.

You watch Rey scour the place for you. She's turn this into a game. Maybe that's what you need to calm yourself down. Afterwards, you can ask about those marks.

"Come out, little man. Can't hide forever. I know every inch of this place." Rey said. After a long day of scavenging, she was in need of a bit of fun. She was already thinking of more fun thing to do when she found you. After she chastise you for hiding from her in the first place.
1412211.title: Knowing your roommate

14122111.content:
Rey looked in all the small places you could fit and finds you under beside the counter.

"Found you." She said grabbing you. She heads over to a chair and sits down. Rey opens her hand and the smile she had was gone and replaced with a frown.

"What were you thinking?! Do you have any idea how dangerous it is to just up and disappear like that? Not to mention how worried I was and if I didn't find you?" She said. While not yelling at you, the sternness her voice had was enough for you to understand.

"I didn't....do it on purpose to make you worry." You said.

"Then why did you?"

"You looked bored, so I thought you could use a little fun. And you did enjoy yourself while looking." You said, hoping she would buy your lie. Rey looks at you for a few seconds before sighing.

"I did have some fun. Even though I was worried sick on the inside."

"See? We both enjoyed ourselves in the end, and no one got hurt."

"Wait. You're not getting off that easily. She said with a smile.

"I knew it..."

"You need to be punished for not listening to me. And I know just how." She said. Rey lowers you onto the table and takes off her boots and puts her feet up in front of you.

"Since I've been on my aching feet all day, you're going to rub them to make them feel better." You stare her huge feet up and down as the realization hit you like a speeder. You pant hard as you make your way to the ship's reactor. It was an ambush. The Republic was trying to take out the Empire's new prototype ship. A ship that could take out any Republic ship in one hit. Making space combat fall in favor of the Empire. Attack any planet no matter how well guarded it is. But that won't happen if the Republic destroys the prototype. You don't know how they caught wind of it and you don't care. You just have to get to the reactor core and protect it.

When you got there, you saw a massacre. Lightsaber burns on the ground and walls Bodies of dead troopers. Republic and Empire. And dead Jedi and Sith. Some still holding active sabers. And in the center, at the main reactor stood one lone Jedi. You gulp and steel yourself as you approach her.

"Stop right there!" You said. She turns to face you and it's no random Jedi. You've seen holoimages of her before. She was the grandmaster of the Jedi order. Satele Shan.

"You're too late. The reactor has been overloaded and this ship will be no more. I advise you leave before the ship explodes." She said. After fighting her way through and losing her strike force one by one, Satele didn't want to add another body to the pile, but you had a job to do. Jedi or not.

"There's still time to stop it." You said. You fired a few shots, but she deflects them and in one swift motion slices your blaster in half and points her saber at you. "Blast...." You muttered.

"Your sith master is dead. There's no need to throw your life away like this. There's still time to retreat." She said, wanting you to see reason. But you can't. Or won't. The Empire can't lose this ship. If there's time to run, then there's time to stop the overload. So you pull out vibroblade and clash with her saber. You know it was suicidal to do this, but you have to do something.

Since you were a simple soldier, it was more than easy to push you away. "I don't want to fight you. There's been enough death today." You don't say anything and go at her. She blocks your strikes and push her back to the reactor. You couldn't believe that you were pushing her back. Except Satele wasn't even trying. She could have killed you with the first swing. But she's had enough killing. She's just trying to tire you out.

And it was working, you were getting exhausted. You can't keep this up much longer. So when her back was against the reactor, you go for a heavy swing which she dodged easily. But neither of you kept an eye on the reactor which was going critical. When your attack missed, it caused an explosion that blew you back.

"Argh!" You said. You hit the ground hard and are knocked out.

Satele's job was done. The reactor was going critical. The ship's detonation was imminent. She had to leave now. But before she did, she went to your body and sense for a pulse. You were alive, but just barely and knocked out. Satele breathes in relief and goes to carry you, but your body was getting smaller. Satele looked on in surprise as your body was getting smaller and smaller until it finally stopped.

Satele looked at you unconscios, small frame in amazement. But the heavy explosion knocked her back to her senses. She quickly grabbed you and hid you on her person and ran to the extraction ship. She got on board and the ships got away just in time.

With the Empire's secret weapon destroyed, it was one less thing for her to worry about. Now she has something else to replace that. The small Imperial soldier she has in her hand.

155331.content:
There was a flash of white and then blackness…

It was over, the woman who had been chasing you across the inner rim had finally caught up to you on a scavenger station. In the chaos that ensued, thankfully most, if not all of the civilians fled. It was just you and the black-clad imperial inquisitor. Over the past few weeks, you had a few close calls, but you were cornered now. But you were a Jedi… well, at least a padawan.

You fought valiantly, but in the end, it appeared that the woman was simply a better duelist than you. As you fought through the scavenger station, you were flung against some discarded separatist tech from the war. There was a flash… And you thought that was it.

But evidently it wasn’t, as you groaned as you came to consciousness. Sirens were wailing from somewhere in the distance. You opened your eyes, the metal ceiling seemed blurry and oddly distant. You blinked as things started to focus. It did look distant… Very distant. That separatist tech was just beside you, but far; like you were a child again… But even smaller. You started to sit up just as you heard what sounded like a thud coming from behind you.

Just as you turned you heard it again, but louder. Seconds later you realized what it was, and what had happened. It was the inquisitor… only, she was huge. No, you were small very small. Whatever that separatist tech was, it had done this to you. But you didn’t have time to consider the implications of what that meant as there was another crash as the inquisitor's black leather boots drew even closer.

You reeled back as she was approached as the toe of her boot crashed just in front of you as she stepped over you. In complete awe, you watched her lithe form pass over you as she approached the machine that you had been knocked against. She knelt to the ground to inspect something, and her hand rose back into view with your lightsaber in it.

“I know that you are here…” Her voice, augmented by her mask resonated across the room. “There is nowhere to run padawan…” She said, her mask scanning the room, and landing right on you…

Her head tilted slightly as she stared at you, seemingly at a loss for words for the first time since you encountered her. “Now that is curious…” She purred, as she rose to her feet and strode over towards you.

Her grip tightened around you as she stood back up, her gaze lingering on what little of you she could see with her fist wrapped around you. The hatch opened before her, and she held you out in front of her. “I’ll see you in a bit…” She purred in an exaggeratedly sensual manner before she let go…

It would take at least a half-hour for the interceptor to return to the Star Destroyer in orbit around the backwater planet that served as most of this small corner of the inner rim’s commerce.
